headers.subject: [tosdr:1726] [Good] Spotify tells users of privacy policy changes

html:
Spotify informs users through the Service of any material changes to their privacy policy. They recommend users check the privacy policy for an minor changes.

We may make changes to this Privacy Policy from time to time, so please visit this Privacy Policy regularly. If we make changes which we believe are material, we will inform you through the Service. Your continued use of the Service thereafter constitutes acceptance of the changes.

https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/privacy-policy/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: [Good] Spotify tells users of privacy policy changes
text:

privacy policy. They recommend users check the privacy policy for an minor 
changes.
